New Records: Yuki Kawamura scored an NBA career-high 10 points
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded a 35-point, seven-assist performance
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura hopes 2025 will be a year in which he can feel he's grown even more
Miscellaneous Highlights: Japan finished the Olympic tournament with a disappointing 0-3 record
